commits.content:
import {
  Box,
  Button,
  Flex,
  FormControl,
  FormLabel,
  Input,
  InputGroup,
  InputLeftElement,
  Textarea,
  VStack,
} from '@chakra-ui/react';
import { BsPerson } from 'react-icons/bs';
import { MdOutlineEmail } from 'react-icons/md';

export default function Contact() {
  return (
    <Flex
      w="100%"
      h="100%"
      bg='#540157'
      align="center"
      justify="center">
      <Box
        w="500px"
        bg='gray.700'
        borderRadius="lg"
        p={8}
        color='whiteAlpha.900'
        shadow="base">
        <VStack spacing={5}>
          <FormControl isRequired>
            <FormLabel>Seu nome</FormLabel>

            <InputGroup>
              <InputLeftElement />
              <Input type="text" name="name" placeholder="Digite o nome do seu personagem" />
            </InputGroup>
          </FormControl>

          <FormControl isRequired>
            <FormLabel>Seu ID</FormLabel>

            <InputGroup>
              <InputLeftElement />
              <Input
                type="number"
                name="email"
                placeholder="Digite seu ID do jogo"
              />
            </InputGroup>
          </FormControl>

          <FormControl isRequired>
            <FormLabel>Celular</FormLabel>

            <Input
              name="message"
              type="number"
              placeholder="Digite o número de celular do seu personagem"
            />
          </FormControl>

          <Button w="full" type="submit">
            Entrar no Bahamas
          </Button>
        </VStack>
      </Box>
    </Flex>
  );
}
